mapper.select:
select
from articles a inner join categories c on a.category_id=c.id inner join users u on a.user_id=u.id where a.enabled=1 order by a.id desc

select
from articles a inner join categories c on a.category_id=c.id inner join users u on a.user_id=u.id where a.enabled=1 and a.user_id=#{userId} order by a.id desc

select
from articles a inner join categories c on a.category_id=c.id inner join users u on a.user_id=u.id where a.enabled=1 and a.id=#{id}
